cast.overview: Three moments in Takaki's life: his relationship with Akari and their forced separation; his friendship with Kanae, who is secretly in love with him; the demands and disappointments of adulthood, an unhappy life in a cold city.
cast.title: 5 Centimeters per Second

cast.overview: Takao, who is training to become a shoemaker, skipped school and is sketching shoes in a Japanese-style garden. He meets a mysterious woman, Yukino, who is older than him. Then, without arranging the times, the two start to see each other again and again, but only on rainy days. They deepen their relationship and open up to each other. But the end of the rainy season soon approaches.
cast.title: The Garden of Words

details.biography: Hiroshi Shimozaki (下崎 紘史, Shimozaki Hiroshi, born September 25, 1977) is a Japanese seiyū (voice actor) from Toyama Prefecture. He belongs to Ogi Pro The Next. He combines his voice acting with performing on stage as a member of the theater company Alter Ego. His hobbies are karaoke and baseball. He is the eldest of three siblings and has a twin brother and a younger sister.
details.name: Hiroshi Shimozaki
